metadata.dc:author: Mahieu, Eduardo L
metadata.dc:description: Just few thinkers and clinical psychiatrists have branded the development and nosographies of the specialty as much as the german teacher Emil Kraepelin did. This article presents in a synoptic way the ten classifications he has developed during his clinical work.
metadata.dc:title: Las diez clasificaciones de Kraepelin.
[The ten classifications of Kraepelin].
